summary:
This mod adds a follower NPC which is level 81.
ONLY SUITABLE FOR LEVEL 81 (or above) PLAYERS
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcoem to
[img]http://s1.postimage.org/t5l1hplrj/testata.jpg[/img]
[/center]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod adds a follower NPC which is level 81.
ONLY SUITABLE FOR LEVEL 81 (or above) PLAYERS

[img]http://s11.postimage.org/sr41jx283/argan01.jpg[/img]

* DESCRIPTION *
Playing at Level 81 and at Master difficulty in Skyrim, all the followers are weak compared to you.
So I made this mod for my own use and now I want to share with you.

[img]http://s22.postimage.org/h3q0pksht/argan03.jpg[/img]

This is Argan, an Imperial male (with Nord voice). He Level 81, is a Warrior Mage and can do shouts.
Also, he is 100 in one-handed skill, in destruction skill and in heavy armor skill, all with properly perks.
His outfit is a (vanilla) enchanted ebony armor and he have a custom daedric sword.

* WHERE IS ARGAN? *
Argan can be found in Whiterun, at the Drunken Huntsman house.
Please take note: Argan won\'t follow you unless you\'re at least Level 81!

[img]http://s22.postimage.org/b0d1jerlt/argan02.jpg[/img]

* INSTALLATION *
Place ESP and BSA in data folder and activate it

* UNINSTALL *
Before uninstall, get back all your items from him (if you gave him) or you\'ll lost these items.

* FACEBOOK *
https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods

Join me!
author: MannyGT
